body:
As part of this release we had [3 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=27&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#1673__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1673) Name claim no longer required when signing-in a user.
- [__#1665__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1665) No refresh token returned with TokenUsage.ReUse 
- [__#1662__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1662) UserInfo should call IsActive

As part of this release we had [2 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=25&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#1605__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1605) When client allows local login, yet client has idp restrictions, local login not actually allowed
- [__#1604__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1604) Moving IdentityServerMiddleware IEventService parameter from constructor to Invoke

As part of this release we had [68 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=14&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#1580__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1580) add options validation at startup time
- [__#1574__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1574) Decorators in DI should wrap last service in DI (not first)
- [__#1477__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1477) Don't use default signin scheme -- be explicit and use auth scheme
- [__#1453__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1453) Error: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute. 
- [__#1370__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1370) dotnet core 2.0 cookie authentication uses samesite = lax as default
- [__#1283__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1283) ICustomAuthorizeRequestValidator ErrorDescription not bubbled up
- [__#1276__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1276) Remove Enabled check from InMemoryClientStore
- [__#1258__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1258) Client secret stilling being logged in 1.5.1/1.5.2
- [__#1250__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1250) idp:Negotiate on acr_values does not work!
- [__#1217__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1217) Removed duplicate scopes
- [__#1144__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1144) Add condition to logging in IntrospectionResponseGenerator.AreExpectedScopesPresent 
- [__#1101__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1101) CorsPolicyService implementation not being picked up...

__enhancements__

- [__#1576__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1576) Separate callback route endpoints from base route endpoints
- [__#1571__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1571) Add PairWiseSubjectSalt to Client
- [__#1523__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1523) Consider adding IsActive to TestUser
- [__#1518__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1518) Consider ISystemClock?
- [__#1514__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1514) Make Endpoint class public to allow custom routing
- [__#1482__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1482) Add authN scheme diagnostics logging at startup
- [__#1475__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1475) user session rework to allow changing user from custom authorize logic
- [__#1473__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1473) support using configuration binder
- [__#1471__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1471) Add ICorsPolicyService caching layer
- [__#1457__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1457) Consider properties collection on Client
- [__#1443__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1443) Install .NET Core 2.0 in Travis Builds
- [__#1438__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1438) [Feature] Allow to manually override host and base path with custom values
- [__#1431__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1431) Make InputLengthRestrictions.TokenHandle configurable
- [__#1401__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1401) Enable Tests for both netcoreapp2.0 and net461
- [__#1395__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1395) make it easier to reject an authorization request from the login pageâ€¦
- [__#1391__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1391) make endpoint router extensible #1364
- [__#1389__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1389) remove XFO from end session callback iframe #1224
- [__#1367__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1367) Propagate parsed secret throughout token validation pipeline
- [__#1354__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1354) automatically add store implementations to DI when adding cached stores
- [__#1326__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1326) added "alg" to JsonWebKey and DiscoveryResponseGenerator
- [__#1272__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1272) Move PersistedGrantTypes to public constants
- [__#1270__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1270) Feature: Allow PKCE on demand
- [__#1252__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1252) Add copyright to check_session_iframe code
- [__#1246__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1246) Consider better UTC now helper
- [__#1235__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1235) Change DefaultGrantStore.GetHashedKey to virtual
- [__#1228__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1228) Allow PKCE on demand (without explicit configuration)
- [__#1165__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1165) Consider enforcing unique names in InMem stores
- [__#1138__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1138) add same overloads for validation keys as signing keys
- [__#1135__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1135) Consistent expiration handling
- [__#1084__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1084) Consistent expiration handling
- [__#1081__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1081) Add helper to register IRedirectUriValidator
- [__#1066__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1066) Deal with Azure AD federation gateway problem
- [__#1060__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1060) make resource base class for api and identity resources
- [__#1002__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1002) Add support for getting IdentityServer error details in ErrorMessage
- [__#951__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/951) Consider a Client setting to set a consent expiration
- [__#870__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/870) New Feature: Allow the ability to validate a refresh_token
- [__#846__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/846) consider decoupling GetIdentityServerUser APIs from cookie middleware

__breaking changes__

- [__#1534__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1534) Consider making client claims prefix value configurable
- [__#1487__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1487) Add refresh token validator as part of ITokenValidator
- [__#1446__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1446) Use default schemes plumbing
- [__#1402__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1402) consider using default authN scheme 
- [__#1394__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1394) Update to ASP.NET Core v2
- [__#1375__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1375) Only revoke specific refresh token (not all for client)
- [__#1344__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1344) Consider RequireConsent = false by default
- [__#1277__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1277) GetAllResources on IResourceStore should be named "Async"
- [__#1139__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1139) Remove AddTemporarySigningCredential in 2.0
- [__#1073__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1073) Token revocation cleanup
- [__#1055__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1055) Support ASP.NET Core 2.0
- [__#1049__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1049) Check extensibility points for v2 rework
- [__#1044__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1044) Change AddFilteredClaims to AddClaims on the ProfileContext
- [__#1042__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1042) Refactor token response generator for cleaner extensibility
- [__#1003__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1003) Removed redundant client parameter from IClaimsService
- [__#1001__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1001) Introspection re-work
- [__#874__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/874) Change client allowed grant types to ICollection
- [__#848__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/848) Change ICustomAuthorizeRequestValidator.ValidateAsync to not return AuthorizeRequestValidationResult
- [__#746__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/746) Update logout implementations

As part of this release we had [4 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=23&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#1132__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1132) Disable default caching for discovery
- [__#1126__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1126) invalid join logic on GetAllGrantsAsync in DefaultPersistedGrantService
- [__#1119__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1119) Fixed AddDeveloperSigningCredential on full framework
- [__#1075__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1075) Test user profile service throws on invalid sub

As part of this release we had [7 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=22&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#1036__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1036) ids4 configured to use external Login page and hosted in an application within iis produces duplicated path in the returnUrl
- [__#1030__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/1030) Create new collection when implying all scopes if none requested

__enhancements__

- [__#1048__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1048) Resolve ICorsPolicyProvider dynamically from DI from CorsPolicyProvider
- [__#1025__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1025) DefaultGrantStore checking expiration, logging expired grants as not found
- [__#965__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/965) AuthorizeResult and ErrorMessage discard the ErrorDescription in AuthorizeResponse
- [__#810__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/810) Consider ability to define cache-control header for discovery endpoint
- [__#579__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/579) Consider cors caching

As part of this release we had [1 issue](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=21&state=closed) closed.


__bug__

- [__#1006__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/1006) Client JWT assertion should read client_id from sub claim only
As part of this release we had [1 issue](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=20&state=closed) closed.

As part of this release we had [9 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=19&state=closed) closed.


<!---
@huboard:{"order":7.0}
-->


__bug__

- [__#932__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/932) Fix typo in the X-Frame-Options directive.

__new feature__

- [__#953__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/953) New Events Design

__enhancements__

- [__#985__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/985) Add XML code comments
- [__#957__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/957) Add option to persists temp key
- [__#934__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/934) Improve PKCE logging messages
- [__#907__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/907) Add IdentityServerBuilder extensions for client and resources stores
- [__#887__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/887) Pass LoginUrl/LogoutUrl from IdentityServerOptions to auth cookie
- [__#738__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/738) Log the tokens generated for debugging purposes
- [__#540__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/540) Finish off eventing programming model

We needed to revert removing the NET452 build target because of a bug in the crypto libraries in .NET.

https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/902

As part of this release we had [4 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=17&state=closed) closed.


__bug__

- [__#896__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/896) GetAllUserConsentsAsync not returning all consents

__enhancements__

- [__#901__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/901) Remove NET452 Target
- [__#886__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/886) Use response generator pattern for discovery endpoint
- [__#850__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/850) csproj all the things

As part of this release we had [2 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=18&state=closed) closed.


__bugs__

- [__#875__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/875) Login page does not hide external IdPs with empty Caption
- [__#815__](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/815) User denying consent isn't an "error"

As part of this release we had [6 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=15&state=closed) closed.

@huboard:{"order":11.5}
-->

**bugs**
- [**#825**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/825) Validate scoped services

**enhancements**
- [**#832**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/832) Make certain access token creation parameters dynamic
- [**#827**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/827) Improve logging when grant validation error occurs.
- [**#802**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/802) Add external cookie middleware when default signin scheme is used

As part of this release we had [3 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=16&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#782**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/782) Default ctor of GrantValidationResult throws
- [**#781**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/781) Refresh requests should not return identity tokens if no identity scopes were requested

**enhancement**
- [**#772**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/772) allow JsonWebKeys that contain an asymmetric key

As part of this release we had [5 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=9&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#759**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/759) The 'scope' property returned by the introspection endpoint is not properly formatted

- [**#692**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/692) Update to latest MS.IdentityModel

As part of this release we had [5 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=11&state=closed) closed.

- [**#650**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/650) Exception in IIS when using windows authentication

- [**#645**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/645) Correct use of IHttpContextAccessor

- [**#660**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/660) Consider more defensive handling for deserailization of JSON in persisted grants.
- [**#659**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/659) Relax form-action CSP on authorize response

As part of this release we had [22 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=5&state=closed) closed.

**bug**
- [**#586**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/586) PersistedGrantStore should implement expiration logic

**enhancements**
- [**#624**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/624) Consider expose PersistentGrantSerializer as interface
- [**#623**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/623) Use ReadFormAsync instead Form on HttpRequest
- [**#619**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/619) Consider DateTimeHelper to be public as well as its UtcNowFunc
- [**#618**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/618) Add overload to AddSigningCredential that allows adding by thumbprint
- [**#615**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/615) Make sure all extensibility interfaces are public
- [**#614**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/614) Consider moving handle generation into stores
- [**#613**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/613) Get rid of .Default namespace
- [**#612**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/612) Introduce handle generation service
- [**#606**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/606) Remove eventing for 1.0
- [**#600**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/600) Research extension custom grant validation result without sub
- [**#595**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/595) Remove InMemoryUser from Core and move to Quickstart UI

- [**#523**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/523) Check amr in RO flow

name: RC5
body:
As part of this release we had [6 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=10&state=closed) closed.

**bug**
- [**#527**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/527) Too many scopes from API resource included when querying resource store

**enhancements**
- [**#549**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/549) Update Travis to .NET 1.1
- [**#547**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/547) Support prompt=select_account
- [**#534**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/534) Expose redirect_uri in authorization context
- [**#522**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/522) Propagate API names as audiences to the access token
- [**#415**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/415) Issue a notice when IdSrv uses a expired certificate for token signing

name: RC4-Update1
body:
As part of this release we had [8 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=8&state=closed) closed.

**bug**
- [**#512**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/512) Scope display name not getting set

**enhancements**
- [**#526**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/526) Don't require credentials for for implicit clients on revocation endpoint
- [**#525**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/525) Remove user claims and change to string collection on resources
- [**#524**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/524) Include API resource names in access token audiences
- [**#521**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/521) Do we need UserClaim.Description?
- [**#520**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/520) Do we need ApiResource.Description?
- [**#499**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/499) Consider removing AllowAccessToAllScopes
- [**#390**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/390) Add CSP to host UI

name: RC4
body:
As part of this release we had [10 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=7&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#475**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/475) CSP security headers does not work in Microsoft Edge Browser
- [**#470**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/470) CustomTokenRequestValidationContext.Result.IsError = true - Throws excepion

**enhancements**
- [**#509**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/509) new resource based configuration changes
- [**#503**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/503) Remove role scope/claim from all sample code
- [**#502**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/502) Fixes #487 - Name of the session cookie is derived from EffeciveAuthenticationScheme
- [**#496**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/496) Consider removing ClaimsRule
- [**#495**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/495) Consider removing IncludeAllClaimsForUser
- [**#482**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/482) Updated docs for code that doesn't break the program
- [**#429**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/429) reworked persisted grant service and split into separate interfaces

name: RC3
body:
As part of this release we had [20 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=6&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#441**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/441) session id being overwritten while user logged in
- [**#438**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/438) RequireSignOutPrompt on Client is Missing
- [**#392**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/392) Removing session id cookie when user no longer authenticated is incorrect
- [**#384**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/384) Rename InMemoryLoginService.cs

**enhancements**
- [**#459**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/459) Add client protocol check at token endpoint
- [**#440**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/440) add signout for external idp in UI
- [**#436**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/436) Change InMemoryUser to support collection initializers
- [**#426**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/426) Update docs and samples for new API surface
- [**#425**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/425) Add extensibility properties to Client class
- [**#418**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/418) Make GetAuthorizationContextAsync extensible
- [**#405**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/405) Add Login/Logout related events
- [**#404**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/404) Remove "AddDeveloperIdentityServer"
- [**#389**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/389) Add logging to cache
- [**#388**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/388) Add more context to IsActive 
- [**#381**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/381) Disable plain text PKCE by default
- [**#380**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/380) Check value type for auth_time
- [**#368**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/368) The naming of AddInMemoryStores
- [**#279**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/279) Register AddMemoryCache in our AddInMemoryCaching
- [**#242**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/242) Add CSP/XFO security headers
- [**#166**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/166) Enable authorize/token validation pipeline extensibility

name: RC2
body:
As part of this release we had [30 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=4&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#365**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/365) Possible NullRefException in UserInfo
- [**#354**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/354) Claims valueType serialization : Introspection endpoint
- [**#287**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/287) License URL in IdentityServer4-1.0.0-rc1-update1 package is incorrect.
- [**#282**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/282) Clear session id on incoming requests if user is no longer authenticated
- [**#280**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/280) Primary key violation on Persisted Grants after deleting cookies
- [**#277**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/277) Sometimes get a "idp claim is missing" with AspNetIdentity when authorizing
- [**#274**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/274) Constants no longer public accessible

**enhancements**
- [**#367**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/367) Docs: Update to RC2
- [**#366**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/366) gen new sid on each login
- [**#363**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/363) HashSet all the collections
- [**#359**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/359) Consistently check for Enabled in Clients and Scopes
- [**#325**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/325) Port "private_key_jwt" from IdentityServer3
- [**#319**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/319) Consider ignoring IdP acr_value if IdP not in client allowed list
- [**#318**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/318) Add logic/support to bypass HRD on login screen
- [**#317**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/317) Add flag for IsAuthenticatedLogout on LogoutRequest
- [**#315**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/315) Add "Remember me" functionality to sample UI
- [**#301**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/301) rename quickstart to developer, moved in-mem
- [**#299**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/299) Update to 1.0.1 ASP.NET Core packages
- [**#298**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/298) Rename AddIdentityServerQuickstart to AddDeveloperIdentityServer
- [**#288**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/288) Consider how to allow custom form post authorization response html
- [**#286**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/286) Scope claim is always a string array
- [**#285**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/285) tests for FederatedSignOutMiddleware
- [**#272**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/272) AuthenticationManagerExtensions does not provide an overload that allows for setting persistent cookies 
- [**#265**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/265) Unit tests for client list cookie
- [**#264**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/264) Unit tests for authN handler/session id
- [**#263**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/263) Unit tests for persisted grant svc
- [**#260**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/260) Consider builder extension method for registering IProfileService
- [**#256**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/256) Verify logging consistency
- [**#236**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/236) Cleanup result object style
- [**#3**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/3) Check for our required services in UseIdentityServer

name: RC1
body:
As part of this release we had [49 issues](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues?milestone=3&state=closed) closed.

**bugs**
- [**#228**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/228) Weird interaction behaviour when signing in.
- [**#201**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/201) Logout null exception /connect/endsession
- [**#199**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/199) Exception during logout in "irregular situation"
- [**#193**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/193) Permanent Session - Remember my login - idsrv.session expiration 

**enhancements**
- [**#249**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/249) More Quickstart refactor
- [**#248**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/248) Ui path rework
- [**#244**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/244) Quickstart refactoring
- [**#243**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/243) Design "Quickstart"
- [**#241**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/241) Making scope parameter optional at the token endpoint 
- [**#240**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/240) Tie session id to primary authentication scheme
- [**#239**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/239) Make client list cookie scoped to session id
- [**#238**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/238) Add support for custom token response fields for resource owner and extension grants
- [**#234**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/234) Update sign out to latest spec
- [**#230**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/230) Consent & Permission API?
- [**#227**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/227) Is AuthenticationOptions.EnableLocalLogin still needed?
- [**#226**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/226) Call IsActive for resource owner requests
- [**#225**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/225) Move serialisation helpers from EF repo to Core
- [**#224**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/224) Decorators replacement
- [**#223**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/223) Unify transient stores
- [**#222**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/222) Get rid of DateTimeOffset?
- [**#221**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/221) Get rid of ErrorTypes.Client vs User
- [**#220**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/220) Discuss IResourceOwnerPasswordValidator
- [**#219**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/219) Refactor config API
- [**#212**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/212) Is Token.Client needed?
- [**#209**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/209) /connect/endsession redirect post_logout_redirect_uri parameter not used
- [**#208**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/208) Refactoring?
- [**#206**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/206) Obfuscate introspection events
- [**#205**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/205) Custom token response headers for custom grants
- [**#204**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/204) Setup release notes
- [**#200**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/200) Log noise when using multiple secret validators
- [**#194**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/194) GetLoginContext on UserInteractionService returns null when posting login
- [**#183**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/183) Create integration tests for PKCE
- [**#181**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/181) add PKCE support [WIP]
- [**#180**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/180) Provide Serialization classes for tokens, claims etc.
- [**#179**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/179) Factor out InMemory implementation
- [**#169**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/169) Pass access token claims to profile service via UserInfo
- [**#168**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/pull/168) Support for public clients
- [**#167**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/167) Discuss CORS
- [**#161**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/161) Default client scopes
- [**#146**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/146) Enable extensibility or replacement of endpoint route names for UI controllers
- [**#144**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/144) Federated Signout
- [**#134**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/134) Allow public clients without a client secret
- [**#46**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/46) How can I create a new ILocalizationService for a new language
- [**#43**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/43) Enable extensibility or replacement for endpoint handlers
- [**#31**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/31) Port PKCE Metadata
- [**#23**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/23) Port Token Revocaction Endpoint
- [**#22**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/22) Port Custom Token Response Generator
- [**#21**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/21) Port PKCE Token Part
- [**#20**](https://github.com/IdentityServer/IdentityServer4/issues/20) Port PKCE Authorize part
